entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2 except minus 6 in low lying inland areas.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 2 except minus 6 in low lying inland areas. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain. High 8 except plus 3 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Periods of rain beginning late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 8 except plus 3 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to periods of snow or rain in the evening. Risk of freezing rain late in the evening and overnight. Fog patches developing in the evening. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
